spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout is preserved, but wall thicknesses are inconsistent. Bedroom proportions are slightly elongated compared to the 2D plan. Door/window placements are generally correct.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation regarding text: the 3D model contains 'hallucinated' garbled text labels on the floor surface, which were explicitly forbidden. The floating model and background constraints are met.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan well. Sink, stove, bed, and dining set are correctly allocated, though the sofa orientation in the living area is slightly rotated vs the rug placement.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style with an orthographic isometric camera. No photorealistic textures are present. Lighting is soft and neutral.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan have been incorrectly projected/hallucinated onto the 3D floor geometry.
Distortion in bedroom and utility room dimensions relative to the living area.
